explains: v. 标志，预示；表示，意指

sentences.en: Many people believe that plural marriages denote immorality of other societies.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为多妻制意味着其他社会的不道德。

sentences.en: The flashing lights denote dangerous roads ahead.
sentences.cn: 闪光表示前方道路危险。

sentences.en: Listing 3 shows how to denote a publication list.
sentences.cn: 清单3显示了如何表示发布列表。
